title: Stacy and Tim Featured in LawNext

config: Congratulations to Stacy and Tim for being featured in LawNext, a podcast that features the innovators and entrepreneurs who are driving whatâ€™s next in law. On the podcast, Stacy and Tim discussed how they came to start FindLaw and Justia, their hard work over 25 years, and their plans to keep providing free access to law.
Listen to the full podcast here.
